item.description:
How do some people get so lucky?

What is it that allows one couple to have an easy, successful, happy, loving relationship that lasts? Is it luck? I certainly hope not! Is it just love? I don’t think so, or the divorce rate would be a lot lower.

And how is it you get annoyed by someone’s behavior and someone else doesn’t? How do some people find it so easy to understand and forgive negative behavior?

Turns out that there are certain beliefs and attitudes that support an easier aligning and allowing for relationship success – any kind of relationship. And once you understand the premise behind these beliefs, they are very desirable and easy to accept.

These beliefs will help you with:

• Ending the who’s right and who’s wrong arguments.
• Putting an end to “That’s not what I said!” and “You’re not listening!”
• How to have more understanding and patience for undesirable behaviors, and how you can deal with them more positively and effectively.
• How to understand your partner better.
• How to keep your relationship fresh and new and last through time.

Wouldn’t that be nice? I can tell you from over 20 years of personal experience that it is.

Well, wait no longer! Join us in our half-day workshop, Fundamentals of Relationship Success, and you’ll have the opportunity to learn and practice some of the most important beliefs and skills needed to have a solid foundation for happy, successful relationships -personal and professional, romantic and platonic.

Fundamentals of Relationship Success: a half day workshop

Saturday morning, March 6th, 9:30 am -12:30 pm, Wayland Wellness, 15 East Plain St., Wayland, MA 01778

**$55 per person.
**Bring someone with you and pay only $90 for two people.

Bring your friends and make it a fun and life enriching Saturday, with lunch together afterwards!

Please note that you need to register and pay in advance for this event. E-mail me at annide@newpossibilitiescoaching.com with the names, e-mails and phone numbers of who will be attending, and we will send you the appropriate PayPal link to pay the fee.

Eagerly looking forward to creating new possibilities with you!
Ann and Mark
Helping you align towards greater harmony, happiness and success!
item.how_to_find_us: Go to back of front lobby, near water cooler and go upstairs.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Fundamentals of Relationship Success
